parameters.definition: Total acreage available for planting berries
Total days worth of labor available
Days of labor required per acre of blueberries
Watering cost per acre of blueberries
Days of labor required per acre of raspberries
Watering cost per acre of raspberries

description: John has a \param{TotalAcres} acre berry farm on which to plant blueberries and raspberries. John has $\param{BudgetWatering} to spend on watering and \param{TotalLaborDays} days worth of labor available. For each acre of blueberries, \param{LaborBlueberry} days worth of labor and $\param{CostWaterBlueberry} in watering costs is required. For each acre of raspberries, \param{LaborRaspberry} days worth of labor and $\param{CostWaterRaspberry} in watering costs is required. The profit per acre of blueberries is $\param{ProfitBlueberry} and the profit per acre of raspberries is $\param{ProfitRaspberry}. Formulate an LP problem in order to maximize profit.
